name: PurplePages
headline: Purple is an AI agent for online local marketplace transactions.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:marketplace; industry:real-estate; industry:conversational-ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Aditya Ganapathi, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @ HeyPurple (W24). Previous AI/robotics researcher @ Google Brain & UC Berkeley w/ 350+ citations. Born and raised in the bay.

founders.name: Ryan Ali, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @ HeyPurple. Former Software Engineer in enterprise data at Capital One. Economics & Computer Science at Cornell ('21). Born and raised in South Florida.

founders.name: Josh Passell, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder @PurplePages. Born & raised in Palo Alto (Gunn '17). Economics at Cornell ('21). Located in SF

# Buy & Sell Local Goods with Ease
Welcome to PurplePages, the world's first AI-powered marketplace! List your household items with just a snap of a picture.
[Browse Listings](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/</search/items>)Create Listing
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Reach every buyer
Purple automatically crosslists to top local marketplaces. No external accounts required.
[![Facebook Marketplace](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ffb.png&w=384&q=75)](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/<https:/www.facebook.com/marketplace/>)[![PurplePages](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fpages.png&w=384&q=75)](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/</search/items>)[![Craigslist](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fcl.jpg&w=384&q=75)(coming soon)](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/<https:/sfbay.craigslist.org/>)
Sell on autopilot
![](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/_next/image?url=%2Flistings.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Smart Notifications
Easily manage your listings
Stay on top of all your listings through a simple seller dashboard. Purple will update you using text alerts as needed, from suggested price changes to offers, ensuring you're always up to date on your listings.
![](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftodo.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Automatic Responses
Never miss a message
Purple responds to buyers for you, saving you the hassle of answering endless questions and dealing with scammers. When a buyer makes an offer, Purple will loop you in.
Sold on PurplePages...

San Francisco, CA

Araceli N.
Sacramento, CA
> "I was skeptical at first, but Purple exceeded all my expectations. It not only simplified the selling process, but also helped me achieve better prices for my items. It's a game-changer!"
Ian U.
San Diego, CA
> "PurplePages folks are amazing. They genuinely help to sell your product. Professional, always very prompt, very logical. Highly recommend!"
Sandeep
San Jose, CA
> "Thank you for the excellent service! I didn't have to do anything and got what I wanted!"
David H.
Chicago, IL
> "I didn't have to do ****. That was amazing. I have more things for you guys."
Henar U.
San Francisco, CA

generated_description:
**PurplePages: The AI Marketplace Revolution**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, PurplePages is a fresh entrant in the local marketplace space that leverages artificial intelligence to simplify buying and selling. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, this nimble startup comprises a team of just three but packs a punch with its innovative approach.

**What Do They Do?**

PurplePages operates as an AI agent designed specifically for local marketplace transactions. The premise is straightforward: users can list their items—be it furniture or electronics—simply by snapping a picture. The platform automatically cross-lists these items across major local marketplaces like Facebook Marketplace and Craigslist, eliminating the dreary task of managing multiple selling channels. 

**Unique Features**

1. **Smart Notifications**: Sellers receive real-time updates on their listings via text, ensuring they stay informed about offers and suggested price changes.
  
2. **Automatic Responses**: Say goodbye to endless buyer inquiries. PurplePages handles initial buyer communications, filtering out scammers while looping the seller in for serious offers. 

3. **User-Centric Design**: The interface is intuitive, allowing users to create listings in mere seconds, whether they are downsizing, moving, or just decluttering.

**Testimonials and Impact**

Users have lauded PurplePages for its transformative impact on their selling experience. From making $200 off unwanted furniture to streamlining the entire process of selling, the platform has garnered positive feedback. One user noted, "I can't remember the last time a technology changed my consumer behavior forever overnight."

**Get Involved**

If you’re looking to offload items in the San Francisco Bay Area, or simply want to learn more about this AI-driven approach to local commerce, visit [PurplePages](https://www.thepurplepages.ai/stil/). You’ll see for yourself why they're being tagged with buzzwords like ‘artificial-intelligence,’ ‘marketplace,’ and ‘conversational-ai.’

In a world where convenience is king, PurplePages is showing us the future of local transactions. It's simple, effective, and just might change the way you think about selling your things.
